item.title: LVS
item.description: score:-24 Chances: Las Vegas Sands’ fourth-quarter 2023 results are likely to benefit from improved visitation in Macao and Singapore. The revenue and EPS for Las Vegas Sands give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2023. Las Vegas Sands’ expected performance for the quarter ended December 2023 is likely to exceed conventional Wall Street top-and-bottom-line estimates.
